text: NGC 440 is a spiral galaxy of type SA(s)bc pec located in the constellation Tucana. It was discovered on September 27, 1834 by John Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "faint, very small, round." ==References== ==External links== * 0440 18340927 Category:Tucana (constellation) Category:Spiral galaxies
title: NGC 440
